document_data.name: Mara
document_data.mainbody: '''Mara''' was a [[nixie]] living in [[Zhent]]-occupied [[Daggerdale]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Mara lived in a cavern inside the [[Crypt of the Mage-lord]].
document_data.History: In [[1367 DR]], [[Colderan Morn]] filled the Crypt with his [[nightshade]]s. Mara managed to expel them from her home and tried to stop them from wandering in [[Dagger Falls]], but she needed spells and couldn't stop night-roving wood woses.
